title: Outstanding New Student Organization
organization: The University of North Carolina at Charlotte
description: Selected out of 51 organizations created in 2014 for demonstrating consistent flexibility, initiative, creativity, and perseverance

title: Honorary Budding Scholar
description: Invited to attend the 2014 Dupont Summit on Science, Technology, and Environmental Policy Issues in Washington D.C. to present my research paper Creating a Digital Pedagogy: Exploring Online Learning Methods to Increase STEM Graduates
